Pre-Game Insights: Experts predicted Sri Lanka as the favorites given their home advantage.
Captain Pathum Nissanka emphasized Sri Lanka’s focus on maintaining their strong performance in the series.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch at the Pallekele International Cricket Stadium, Kandy will allow for good stroke play and the batters will find it easy to bat on the surface.
The surface will not allow a lot of assistance to the bowlers and wicket taking is going to be difficult.
The average 1st innings score at this venue in the last 20 matches is 228 runs.
The team winning the toss should look to bowl first as the majority of the games played on this ground have been won by the chasing side.
Others: The weather is expected to be around 25.74 °C with 84% humidity and moderate rain is expected which may affect playing conditions.
The venue is suited for both Pacers and Spinners alike.

In the first game of this series, Charith Asalanka was the Man of the Match and Pathum Nissanka scored the highest fantasy points for Sri Lanka with 126 match fantasy points while Gudakesh Motie topped the fantasy points leaderboard for West Indies with 95 match fantasy points.
